verses.1: “Hih huihpi in ka dip hong kuasak a, ka dip van a khai hong bangsak hi.
verses.2: Ama kam panin a hong ging khia hih vanging Pasianʼ pauna awging, limtakin ngai in.
verses.3: Amah in vanah khua phiasak a, leimong khat pan mong khat dong a taan hi.
verses.4: Tua ciangin a vanglian vanging, ama awging hong kiza a, tua hun sungteng mahin khua a phiaphia hi.
verses.5: Pasianʼ sawlna tawh nalamdang pipi piang a, eiteʼ theih zawh loh thute a hong piang hi.
verses.6: Amah in leitungah vuk a kia dingin sawl a, guah tampi tak a zusak hi.
verses.7: Amah in mihingte a nasep uh khawlsak a, amah a gamtang ahihna a kilangsak hi.
verses.8: Gamsate in a lupna ngei delh uh a, a kua sungah bucip uh hi.
verses.9: Leitaw lam panin guahpi hong zu a, leilu lam panin huihpi hong nung hi.
verses.10: Pasianʼ husanna in tuite khalsak a, tui lianpite khalin sik bangin a sak hi.
verses.11: Amah in meiipi nomsak a, meiipi in khua a phiasak hi.
verses.12: Pasianʼ deihna zui-in a kikhiin kawikawi hi. Leitung mun khempeuh ah pai-in, Pasianʼ sawl teng a sem uh hi.
verses.13: Pasian in mihingte gim a piak nading ahi a, pahtakna a lah nading ahi zongin, leitungah tu-a bangin a piangsak hi.
verses.14: “Job aw, tawl khat khawlin ngai inla, Pasianʼ bawl sa nalamdangte ngaihsun dih in.
verses.15: Pasian in thu pia a, meii lak panin khua a phiatsak theihna na thei hiam?
verses.16: Bangmah in a len lopi-in vantungah meii a omsak theihna, a lamdang hih ama siamna na thei hiam?
verses.17: Leitaw lam huihpi nasia takin a nun laitakin na puan sungah khua-ul kai-in na om hi.
verses.18: Limlang bangin a sak mahmah van peekpi ama hih bangin zal zo na hi hiam?
verses.19: Pasian kiangah ka gen ding uh hong hilh in. A hawmpi-in ka om uh a, ka gen ding uh om lo hi.
verses.20: Pasian tawh kiho theih nading ka ngen kei ding hi. Kei hong suksiat nadingin kei kipia ding ka hi hiam?
verses.21: “Tawl khat sung khuavak kimu vet lo a, guah le meii in a liah hi. Tua ciangin huih hong nungin tuate khempeuh a mut siang hi.
verses.22: Kham mel khuavak leilu lam pan hong taang a, Pasianʼ minthanna pen zahtakna tawh kidimsak hi.
verses.23: Pasian vanglian mahmah a, eiteʼ theih zawh hi lo hi. Amah thuman mahmah a, thutang takin na a sem hi.
verses.24: Tua ahih manin mi khempeuh in amah a zahtakna, mipil a kisate amah in a don lohna, lamdangsak ding hi lo hi.” a ci hi.
